It belongs to the grass family (Poaceae) and is characterized by its slender, erect stems and narrow, grass-like leaves. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically green or pale blue in color. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is often found in rocky or alpine habitats.
